chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the following issue.
Thank you,

Dear ecomobile

The customer wants a refund for their device, can you please cancel the order and refund?

Regards,
Oscar from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, 

Rlease relay the following message to the customer. 
 
Dear customer,

We are so sorry that you are unhappy with our product, as your product is still in transit, our logistics partner has suggested you to do the following.

1. Refuse the parcel when a delivery attempt is made.
2. If unable to refuse a parcel, do not open the product packaging. Use the return label provided by BackMarket and send the device back immediately.

By doing the following, you would be sure to receive a much FASTER REFUND for this order. 

However, if we may interrupt, if this change of mind is due to a cheaper alternative found, we are able to offer you a commercial gesture of 20 euros instead. 

Thank you.
Regards, 
JH from Ecomobile

Dear ecomobile

The client no longer wants a refund, therefore we will close the incident

Regards,
Oscar from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's message

Regards,
JH
